H0.text: Which religion has ten states of the mind including Neutrality, Rapture, Realization and Bodhisattva. Jainism

H1.text: Which religion has ten states of the mind including Neutrality, Rapture, Realization and Bodhisattva. Taoism

H2.text: Which religion has ten states of the mind including Neutrality, Rapture, Realization and Bodhisattva. Hinduism

H3.text: Which religion has ten states of the mind including Neutrality, Rapture, Realization and Bodhisattva. Buddh

A4.text: The four rupa‑jhānas in Buddhist practice lead to rebirth in better rupa Brahma heavenly realms, while arupa‑jhānas lead into arupa heavens.

A5.text: The Daśabhūmika Sūtra gives ten bodhisattva levels (bhūmis) on the path to Buddhahood.

A6.text: the four progressive states of jhāna called rūpa jhāna, and four additional meditative attainments called arūpa
